content: Yes, some of the treadmills that offer incline and decline options also come with built-in fans to keep you cool during your workouts. For example, the NordicTrack X22i Incline Trainer, ProForm Pro 9000 Treadmill, Sole F85 Folding Treadmill, and Precor TRM 445 Precision Series Treadmill all have fans built into the console to keep you cool and comfortable during intense workouts. Additionally, some of these fans may have adjustable settings to control the speed and direction of the airflow.
